description.full: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Get a taste of Split/Second in this brand new action-packed multiplayer demo. Race online against 7 other players in the Dockyard, or go head-to-head against a friend on the Expressway track in split/screen mode. You can also race the Expressway on your own for a thrilling single-player experience.  Four of the best cars in the game are provided for you to try out, so you can experience the speed and cinematic action at a breakneck pace. Remember, Split/Second reactions are required to emerge victorious!
description.short: (Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB) Race online against 7 other players or go head-to-head in split/screen mode!
